game.name: EVE Online: 1 Month Omega Time
game.genres: Action, Free To Play, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Trading Cards
game.shortDescription: 오메가 클론 상태로 업그레이드하면 이브 온라인에서 최고로 평가받는 함선과 스킬 일부가 해제되며, 훈련 속도가 두 배로 증가합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Upgrading to Omega Clone State will unlock some of EVE's best ships and skills, as well as double training speed.
